name: Torshavn: The Fae Forest
description:
An ascii Roguelike*

King Torshavn is dying 

A sickness fouls his blood and he grows weaker every day.  You must carry the life saving medicinedrug through the  fae forest and deliver it to the palace before the king perishes and the land is plunged into chaos or democracy 

Journey lightly and swift. Do not disturb the peace of the forest or the creatures within! 

Wild mushrooms will sustain you and draw creatures away from you when dropped. Use them wisely!

*written in Forth
